channel.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!
channel.description:
[b][COLOR='Green'][PROBLEM SOLVED] [/b] So I told you guys I bought a Zune in the "Pimp your..." thread. Turns out it doesn't work [b]at all[/b].
It doesn't charge, or if it does very slowly, it now makes 2 hours it's charging and I doesn't even start up. I see a charging sign (the little battery), but it is very pale.
Also, Vista won't install the drivers. When I plug it I don't get a little sound that indicates it found a new hardware. And sometimes it shows in the device manager, sometimes it doesn't. And when it does it just says that installing the drivers failed.
I'm gonna go to where I bought it to see if they can get me a new sync cable.
[i]Edit: They're not open, but the dude told me to come back tomorrow so he'll check this out.[/i]

item.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
IT FUCKIN’ WORKS!

[COLOR=‘Green’]All I had to do is to connect it to another PC, charge and update it and voilà!

Read full topic

I wasn’t talking about you. I was talking about myself.

item.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
Level:

It’s sad when you barely exceed the limits of your music player. When I was approaching 30 gb, I started deleting tons of my music so it’d all fit on my ipod.

Er…there’s a 26 GB difference between 2 and 28. Not what I’d call “barely exceeding.”

Read full topic

item.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
So I got it runnin’ on my dad’s comp (XP Home) and it updated itself to the latest firmware, and it’s charging now. Or well it’s supposed to. We’ll see in an hour. If it’s charged I’m gonna try it in my comp.

If it’s not I’m gonna ask for another cable.

Read full topic

item.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
That’s really odd…I myself got a 2 GB iPod Nano from a friend who’d had it for a couple years and was getting a new one.

I haven’t had any problems with it, except for the fact that it’s 2 GB, and my iTunes library is 28.

Read full topic

item.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!

item.description:
Dr. Perky:

Submit a repair request
https://service.zune.net/en-us/signin
If you didn’t cause this then they should be willing to repair it.

Well the dude at the shop is gonna replace it.

Dr. Perky:

also if your problem is the charging issue

https://support.microsoft.com/kb/938069?sd=zune

That’s the first thing I tried.

@CTID : Yup, brand new.

item.title: Fuckin' crap. FUCK YOU ZUNE!
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
[COLOR=‘Green’][PROBLEM SOLVED]

So I told you guys I bought a Zune in the “Pimp your…” thread. Turns out it doesn’t work at all.

It doesn’t charge, or if it does very slowly, it now makes 2 hours it’s charging and I doesn’t even start up. I see a charging sign (the little battery), but it is very pale.

Also, Vista won’t install the drivers. When I plug it I don’t get a little sound that indicates it found a new hardware. And sometimes it shows in the device manager, sometimes it doesn’t. And when it does it just says that installing the drivers failed.

I’m gonna go to where I bought it to see if they can get me a new sync cable.

Edit: They’re not open, but the dude told me to come back tomorrow so he’ll check this out.

Read full topic
